title: Best of Patreon: June 2022
description:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of June. Subscribe today and you can also catch our Minisode update on the Murdaugh murders dropping this week.
 
You'll hear:

Confessions from Reddit's OffMyChest about tripping a stranger

Advice on going solo to start a family in our Dear Sinister segment

Stories of Heather being hit by a car (twice) in our Live Q&A

All the elementary things we learned late as adults in the Livestream Bonus segment

 
If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits to subscribe today! 
Click here for information on our tour and to purchase tickets
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of June. Subscribe today and you can also catch our Minisode update on the Murdaugh murders dropping this week.

 

You'll hear:

  • Confessions from Reddit's OffMyChest about tripping a stranger
  • Advice on going solo to start a family in our Dear Sinister segment
  • Stories of Heather being hit by a car (twice) in our Live Q&A
  • All the elementary things we learned late as adults in the Livestream Bonus segment

 

If you like what you hear and want full versions of all this and more, head to patreon.com/sinisterhood for full details on all the benefits to subscribe today!
